DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate potential interaction SP2086 Valsartan multiple oral dos treatment healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( volunteer know name treatment assign ) single-center cross-over study SP2086 Valsartan healthy adult volunteer . All subject randomize two group , drug administer accord AB BA sequence , subject must complete two stage ( A B ) . The A sequence Valsartan take 160mg qd Days1-Day12 ; SP2086 administer orally ( mouth ) 200mg Days 8-Day12.The B sequence SP2086 take 200mg qd dose Days 8-Day12.There 6 day washout period two stage . The whole study need 31 day .

History current clinically significant medical illness determine Investigator . Have family history thyroid cancer , submandibular gland cancer long QT syndrome Known allergy SP2086 Glyburide excipients formulation SP2086 Glyburide . History use sulfa sulfonylurea DPPIVor GLP1 drug similar structure drug . History severe unconsciousness hypoglycemia History surgery prior screen 6 month . Within month screen use prescription drug , overthecounter drug , Chinese herbal medicine ( especially oral antidiabetic drug ) food supplement ( vitamin ) . 2 day randomization , patient ban alcohol , tobacco , reference food drink contain caffeine xanthine , vigorous exercise , factor affect drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion . The hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis c antibody , HIV antibody syphilis antibody positive . Pregnancy lactation woman , fertility male female willing contraception test .
